name: Colorox
description:
Colorox is a brand new puzzle game that trains your brain and brings more relax! Swipe to rotate the block until you choose the right colours. Dive into a whole new puzzle experience!
Relax and enjoy the colourful casual game!

【Features】
- Free to play
- Tons of addictive puzzles
- Colourful 3d graphics
- Easy game controls
- Offline gameplay: enjoy the game even without WiFi.

【How to play】
- Rotate the shapes to match the block colours & the target colour palette.
- No time limit, no losing!

Download this casual puzzle for free right now! Relax your mind and enjoy!
